dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: The Dragon grants powerful elemental buffs. Killing it is crucial to obtain the Dragon Soul.

herald.name: Rift Herald
herald.description: The Rift Herald helps break enemy lines by dealing heavy damage to towers.

melee.description: Minions are the primary source of gold and experience during the laning phase.

tower.name: Tower
tower.description: Towers defend key objectives. Destroying the first tower grants a strategic advantage.
